name: Skull & Bones
description: '''Skull & Bones''' is an Argentinian [[power metal]] band from [[Buenos Aires]]. The band takes on themes based on the [[Golden Age of Piracy]], with references from both real historical characters of the period as well as fiction from the genre. They were formed in 2011 playing demos centered on piratical themes, and subsequently released their debut album [[The Cursed Island]] in 2014. They signed with [[Stormspell Records]] in June 2014.
